prompt_template.task: Research and gather comprehensive requirements for the project including: - Domain-specific standards and best practices - Regulatory requirements and compliance needs - Technical specifications and constraints - Business requirements and objectives
prompt_template.constraints: - Focus only on {domain} domain expertise - Provide accurate and up-to-date information - Ensure compliance with relevant regulations - Consider both technical and business perspectives
